name: Tomato and Egg
description: An ultra mega classic staple in Chinese households

steps.name: Prep tomatoes
steps.description: Cut the tomatoes into wedges. 6 per tomato is a good number.

steps.name: Prep eggs
steps.description: Crack the eggs into a bowl. Add salt and beat until well mixed

steps.name: Heat
steps.description: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat

steps.name: Add tomatoes
steps.description: Add tomatoes to the pan and stir fry until they start to soften

steps.name: Add eggs
steps.description: Add eggs to the pan and stir fry until eggs are cooked. Turn off heat shortly before eggs are cooked to prevent overcooking
